title: Understanding the Print Options
text: When you want to print only a specific part of a document, like a table, you need to select the right print option. Consider what options are available when you have a table selected.

title: Exploring the Print Menu
text: Look at the print menu options. Is there an option that specifically mentions printing a selected table or active sheet?

title: Choosing the Correct Print Option
text: Which option would you choose to print only the table?
choices: click "print" while the table is selected
when working on a table, the print function automatically prints only the table
